NAME: View cycle member - invalid member id
Get cycle settings - No Auth Token
Slot swap by group admin - invalid id
SUB SUITE: Cycles > Slots Management > Slot Swap by Group Admin

NAME: Slot exchange - success
Update Cycle - Forbidden (non-admin tries to edit)
Fulfil slot exchage request
SUB SUITE: Cycles > Slots Management > Fulfill Exchange Request

NAME: Assign Slot Positions - invalid id
SUB SUITE: Cycles > Slots Management > Assign Slot Position

DESCRIPTION:
### Overview.

Duration can be one of month/months/week/weeks.  
If the cycle the slot belongs to has a monthly frequency, then the durations should be in `week|weeks`, i.e.

``` json
{
 "duration": "4 weeks"
 }

 ```

if the cycle frequency is monthly, then the duration should be in `month|months` i.e.

``` json
{
 "duration": "4 months"
 }

 ```

> NOTE: Ensure the duration of slot freeze is not greater than duration of the cycle, i.e. a cycle with duration of 6 months, would not allow a slot freeze with duration of 7 months.
NAME: Slot freeze - invalid slot id

DESCRIPTION:
If user_exists is false, the user must create an account before they can accept or reject an invite.  

If user_exists is true, the user has to be logged in to accept or reject an invite.
